In EPAM, our managers often source their strongest team members via their \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"personal network\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". This is because, often, what makes someone a good fit isn't just their skillset, but also their motivation, their team spirit, their ability to adapt, and their creativity. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You won't know if someone is a good fit unless you know the person\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (or at least know someone who knows the person). Therefore, to prepare yourself for a successful complex engagement, start by expanding your EPAM Network. Here are some ways you can do exactly that:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Enroll in a Buddy Program:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Especially helpful for new EPAMers, EPAM’s ongoing Buddy Programs connect you with a mentor buddy to help answer questions and learn how EPAM works. These Buddy Programs have subsections for specific EPAM locations, for new managers, or even to help you develop language skills. Check them out here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/explore?filter=~(isUserContent~false)&search=buddy&sorting=~(~(field~%27rating~direction~%27desc))&tab=catalog\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Learn Buddy Programs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Take on an Internal Initiative:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" You can join a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://hackathon.epam.com/tenant/4a9a4fdc-70e6-4bee-9d6a-73e4356ab1ca/hackathons\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hackathon\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or an ideation challenge on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://nova.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Nova (requires VPN)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You can also take on extra work via \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://opportunities.epam.com/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Opportunities\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or more innovative work on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://ecsc00a07e0e.epam.com/opportunities\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Garage Innovation Network\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMGRG/About+Garage+Innovation+Network\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More info on KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). Additionally, every year we set OKRs for the GDO and Business. You can learn more about how it works here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMVCN/EPAM+Networks\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Networks - EPAM Networks - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Join a Competency:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Competencies are groups of experts and enthusiasts centered around a specific subject matter. You can find a list of competency centers and their contacts here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/CTOOCC/EPAM+Competencies\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Competencies - EPAM CTO Office - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". There are select competency centers with dedicate staffing resources which would be great connections to proactively establish relationships with, check them out in the section \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/GDOKB/How+to+Find+the+Right+People#HowtoFindtheRightPeople-ContactLargerGroups\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Contact Larger Groups\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Help with Presales:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If you have availability, ask your manager, Delivery Head or BU Head if you can help out on a presales engagement. This can give you an opportunity to meet new people in a work environment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Volunteer for an Assessment:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" An assessment committee is a group of experts that handle the review process for promotion. Assessment committees are global groups and often consist of reoccurring members. While there are title and seniority requirements to participate as a committee member, these groups are great ways to connect with other senior experts across EPAM. To volunteer for assessment, check out \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://asmt.epam.com/welcome\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Assessment (epam.com)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
